Module project.notizprogrammrepository
Package project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.segments

Class CalendarSegment

java.lang.Object
project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.segments.Segment
project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.segments.CalendarSegment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
NoteSegment
public class CalendarSegment extends Segment
A container class used for storage of CalendarEntries, representing the calendar-segment of the application.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Calendar
    calendar
    The calendar corresponding to the segment.
    private int
    currentWeek
    The week of the current month that is currently being displayed. default = 1.
    private boolean
    weekViewActive
    A property stating whether the whole month or just a week is currently displayed.

  • Constructor Details

    • CalendarSegment

      public CalendarSegment(Date date)
      Creates a new CalendarSegment with a Calendar corresponding to the given date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the creation of the Calendar.

  • Method Details

    • getCalendar

      public Calendar getCalendar()
      Returns the calendar.
      Returns:
      The calendar.

    • shiftView

      public void shiftView(boolean rightShift)
      Switches one week or month forward or backwards in time. Week or month depends on the weekViewActive-property. Forward is represented by the rightShift parameter being true. Backwards is represented by the rightShift parameter being false
      Parameters:
      rightShift - Represents the direction of the shift. Forward in time = true; backwards in time = false

    • switchView

      public void switchView()
      Switches between weekView and monthView and resets currentWeek to 1.

    • getCurrentWeek

      public Day[] getCurrentWeek()
      Returns a Day-array representing the currently active week.
      Returns:
      The current week as an array of Day objects.

    • getMonth

      public Month getMonth()
      Returns a Month object representing the currently active month.
      Returns:
      The current month.

    • addCalendarEntry

      public void addCalendarEntry(CalendarEntry calendarEntry)
      Adds the given Entry to the calendar.
      Parameters:
      calendarEntry - The Entry to be added.

    • removeCalendarEntry

      public void removeCalendarEntry(CalendarEntry calendarEntry)
      Removes the given Entry from the calendar.
      Parameters:
      calendarEntry - The Entry to be removed.

    • editCalendarEntry

      public void editCalendarEntry(CalendarEntry calendarEntry)
      Changes the properties of the Entry in the calendar that has the same date as the given Entry to the values of the given Entry.
      Parameters:
      calendarEntry - The Entry containing the date of the Entry that is supposed to be changed and the new values for that Entry.

    • getCalendarEntry

      public CalendarEntry getCalendarEntry(Date date)
      Returns th CalendarEntry corresponding to the given date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the Entry.
      Returns:
      The Entry corresponding to the given date.

    • isWeekViewActive

      public boolean isWeekViewActive()
      Returns whether the weekView is currently active.
      Returns:
      Whether the weekView is currently active.
